name: line-sorter
title: Line Sorter
description: Sort text lines alphabetically or numerically with optional duplicate removal
content:
Overview

This application sorts lines in text files alphabetically or numerically, with options for reverse order and duplicate removal.

Features

  • Sort lines alphabetically (case-insensitive)
  • Sort lines numerically by extracting numbers
  • Forward or reverse order sorting
  • Optional duplicate line removal

Parameters

  • Input File: Upload your text file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a sorted text file with the suffix '_sorted.txt' in the specified output directory.
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$$PPID"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/line_sorter.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
